text:
Ordered kata toast set, came with soft boiled egged, toast and a hot drink. For soft boiled eggs, they were cooked perfectly and they crack it for you so that’s a plus.

I changed my drink to iced coffee and it’s quite thick and creamy. I saw other reviews complaining about the drink consistency so maybe I got lucky that day.

Kaya toast was a little sad. It was two slices of bread cut into half, with a small piece of butter placed at the corner of the bun so it looks susbtaintial visually (as long as you don’t open the toast and check inside). The kaya spread was also pathetic, maybe it’s some healthy living crap but please have that reflected in the price as well. Healthy living includes not having a heart attack from seeing what you get for the price paid.

The meal was around $6.50, which is quite comparable with other places like yakun. The only thing they need to match now is the toast quality and portion size.
Amazingly poor. Ordered beef rendang and it comes as chicken rendang. Am cool, but the rendang sauce is just layered on the steamed chicken! Laksa is bland. Nothing great at all. And it's not cheap.

Perfect half boiled eggs, peanut butter toast was decent. The portion for the toast set (toast, 2 half boiled eggs and tea) was just nice for me who was not very hungry in the morning. Macaroni was however disappointing, soup had no flavour and just tasted like adding salt to plain water. Drinks are average. Menu is net price and pricing is typical for a stall in an air condioned place. Hard to find a seat on weekend brunch hours, usually full. Plenty of parking lots at Tampines Hub.

Chanced upon this while my husb and I are looking for brunch. Ordered toast set and curry laksa, teh c , and kopi-peng. We were pleasantly surprised that the tea n coffee are "gao" and nice. (We read some poor reviews) Didnt taste like plain water.. the curry laksa was flavourful.
However, the tables were not cleaned. Prob a busy Sat? Price wise, definitely cheaper than those big brands out there...

Very disappointed with their quality of drinks. The drinks are heavily diluted and really bland. Informed the server and they topped up with diluted tea. Hope the management can improve the drinks quality! It’s a pity for such a local brand to not prioritise the quality of local drinks.
